title: Get ready for the new GSE Profession Strategy

content.text: The GSE Team has been working hard with a diverse range of stakeholders to find out exactly what you want to be included in our new GSE Profession Strategy. The strategy reflects our priorities for years to come and is to ensure the GSE Profession can support its people to make a real difference through government science and engineering.

We are really excited to share it with you and are holding a live launch event on 14th July from 14:00 – 15:00, hosted by Sir Patrick Vallance, with a senior panel discussion’. You can register for the event here.

We will be sending out more details shortly on a full week of activities to showcase each of our themes: Expertise, Interchange, Inclusivity, Learning and Development, Talent and Leadership. You can keep updated on the GSE Blog here.
